item.title: 1. Corpora, Language Models, Smoothing
item.description: What are we counting? Tokens and types. Instances of words and kinds of words. Corpora: A body of language data. Most useful when occurring naturally. Be aware of bias. Vocabulary: Set of unique Words Size of corpus: Total number of words Word Order Matters! Should consider past words, but not ALL past words. \(P(car|the\:old) = 0\) may never appear in the corpus, but \(P(old|the) > 0\) and \(P(car|old) > 0\) could be true, \(\therefore P(the\:old\:car) > 0\).
